Sentencas: The (electro-)kinetics of the reverse water gas shift (RWGS) reaction was studied in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) of the type Pt/YSZ/Pt.
Titulo: Study of the reverse water gas shift (RWGS) reaction over Pt in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) operating under open and closed-circuit conditions

Sentencas: The effect of imposed potentials, cell temperature (650-800 degrees C, H-2 (1-10 kPa) and CO2 (1-10 kPa) partial pressures on the kinetics and mechanism of the catalytic and electrocatalytic RWGS reaction, were systematically examined.
Titulo: Study of the reverse water gas shift (RWGS) reaction over Pt in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) operating under open and closed-circuit conditions

Sentencas: The apparent catalytic activation energy was found equal to 15.6 kcal/mol, while H-2 and CO2 apparent reaction orders were equal to 0.5 and 0.7, respectively.
Titulo: Study of the reverse water gas shift (RWGS) reaction over Pt in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) operating under open and closed-circuit conditions

Sentencas: At both open and closed circuit operation, the associative formate decomposition reaction mechanism was considered to describe kinetics.
Titulo: Study of the reverse water gas shift (RWGS) reaction over Pt in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) operating under open and closed-circuit conditions

Sentencas: Under closed circuit operation, rate enhancement factor, vertical bar A vertical bar, values up to 10 were achieved.
Titulo: Study of the reverse water gas shift (RWGS) reaction over Pt in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) operating under open and closed-circuit conditions

Sentencas: Finally, current density-voltage and current density-power density characteristics of the cell were recorded at various temperatures and gas mixtures Of CO2 and H-2.
Titulo: Study of the reverse water gas shift (RWGS) reaction over Pt in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) operating under open and closed-circuit conditions

Sentencas: It was found that electrical power output of the cell was optimized by increasing temperature and decreasing CO2/H-2 feed ratio.
Titulo: Study of the reverse water gas shift (RWGS) reaction over Pt in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) operating under open and closed-circuit conditions

Sentencas: Maximum power density obtained was 9 mW/cm(2) (at 520 mV cell voltage and a current density of 17.3 mA/cm(2), at 800 degrees C and P-CO2/P-H2 = 0.16).
Titulo: Study of the reverse water gas shift (RWGS) reaction over Pt in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) operating under open and closed-circuit conditions
